imagemap_desc: Yaa ne "image map" la b tõe n yãk n yãk b sẽn dat n tall n tall n yãk b taggã
imagemap_no_image: Yĩngr: Yaa tɩlae tɩ d wilg fotã pipi rʋʋngã pʋgẽ.
imagemap_invalid_image: Yɛllem: Yɛllemã pa zems wall a pa be ye.
imagemap_bad_image: Yĩngr: Yĩngrã pa le be seb-kãngã pʋgẽ ye.
imagemap_no_link: Yĩngr: Pa yãg link sẽn zems sõor ning sẽn yaa $1 wã sɛɛbo ye.
imagemap_invalid_title: Yɛl: Yɛl sẽn pa zems ne sõor ning sẽn be $1 wã pʋgẽ.
imagemap_missing_coord: Yĩngr: Pa zems tɩ d rɩk sõor sẽn be rʋʋg a $1.
imagemap_unrecognised_shape: Yɛlg: B pa yãend tɩ yaa a soab ning sẽn be rʋʋg a $1, tɩ rʋʋg fãa segd n sɩng ne a yembr n yaa: sẽn pa yãend ye, sẽn zems ye, kẽnga, bɩ poly.
imagemap_invalid_coord: Yĩngr: Yĩngrã sẽn pa zems n be $1, segd n yɩɩ sõor ye.
imagemap_invalid_desc: Yĩngr: desc sẽn pa zemsã sẽn segd n yɩ: $1.
imagemap_poly_odd: Yĩngr: B yãee poly ne sõor sẽn pa zems ne sõor ning sẽn be rʋʋngã pʋgẽ $1
